itunes:title: #12: When Trauma Shuts You Down in Relationships
title: #12: When Trauma Shuts You Down in Relationships
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Unresolved trauma gets stuck in your body and not only will affect you individually (mentally, emotionally, spiritually, physically), but also in your relationships as well.   In this episode, we dig into how it may look.    Take Our...
itunes:summary:
Unresolved trauma gets stuck in your body and not only will affect you individually (mentally, emotionally, spiritually, physically), but also in your relationships as well.

 

In this episode, we dig into how it may look. 

 

Take Our Free Masterclass:
How to Heal from Low Self Worth & Stop Repeating Unhealthy Relationships - The 4 Step Roadmap to Breaking Toxic Habits and Getting the Relationships You Want This Year
-- Register now

GET STARTED CHANGING YOUR RELATIONSHIPS
